modules.description: Provides functions to send messages, retrieve channels, and manage user presence using Slack's REST API. Operates with JSON-encoded data structures and OAuth tokens for authentication. Enables automated notifications and real-time updates within OCaml-based workflows.

This module enables interaction with Slack's REST API through operations like session management, message formatting, channel/user administration, file uploads, and search functionalities, all leveraging Slack-specific data types such as sessions, channels, messages, and error variants. It supports asynchronous HTTP requests using Lwt, with structured handling of API responses and errors, making it suitable for real-time messaging apps, team collaboration tools, and automated workflow integrations. Key use cases include managing chat threads, archiving content, monitoring user activity, and parsing detailed API outputs for error resolution.
